text: The canton of Avignon-1 is an administrative division of the Vaucluse department, in southeastern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Avignon.Décret n° 2014-249 du 25 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de Vaucluse It consists of the following communes: #Avignon (partly) ==References== Category:Cantons of Vaucluse
title: Canton of Avignon-1
